titleStmt.title: An ordinance of Parliament for a day of publike thanksgiving for the peace concluded between England and Scotland.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Die Veneris 27. die Augusti 1641.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
With coat of arms of Charles I at head of document.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and
